title: A Musical Instrument description of poem

content.prompt: The poem as a whole is best described as a

choices.label: fantastical account of the circumstances leading up to a well-known historical event
poetic tribute to the beauty that can be found in nature if one takes the time to look
dramatic retelling of a mythological story that resonates with the speakerâ€™s experience
humorous anecdote that describes the adventures of the ancient mythological gods

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Develop a thesis statement that conveys a defensible claim about an interpretation of literature and that may establish a line of reasoning.
